mapper.select: SELECT a.BO as bo, a.PRODUCT_LINE_DESC as resourceName, b.PID as pid, c.RESOURCE_TYPE as andonResourceType, CASE WHEN b.STATE IS NULL THEN '2' ELSE b.STATE END AS STATE FROM m_product_line a LEFT JOIN andon_record b ON a.BO = b.PRODUCT_LINE_BO LEFT JOIN andon_andon c ON b.ANDON_BO = c.BO WHERE a.SITE = #{andonLookPlateQueryDTO.site}

SELECT a.BO as bo, a.STATION_DESC as resourceName, c.PID as pid, d.RESOURCE_TYPE as andonResourceType, CASE WHEN c.STATE IS NULL THEN '2' ELSE c.STATE END AS STATE FROM m_station a LEFT JOIN m_product_line b ON a.PRODUCT_LINE_BO = b.BO LEFT JOIN andon_record c ON b.BO = c.STATION_BO LEFT JOIN andon_andon d ON c.ANDON_BO = d.BO WHERE a.SITE = #{andonLookPlateQueryDTO.site} AND b.WORK_SHOP_BO = #{andonLookPlateQueryDTO.workShopBo}

select d.SHOP_ORDER from p_schedule_production_line a LEFT JOIN p_schedule b ON a.SCHEDULE_BO = b.BO LEFT JOIN p_schedule_shop_order c ON b.BO = c.SCHEDULE_BO LEFT JOIN m_shop_order d ON c.SHOP_ORDER_BO = d.BO WHERE a.PRODUCTION_LINE_BO = #{productLineBo}
